bibl.title: Letter from John R. Bullard to Philip Showalter Hench, May 26, 1941

div1.p: Bullard thanks Hench for the snapshots. He is looking forward to receiving Hench's write-up about him.

div1.head: Letter from John R. Bullard to Philip Showalter Hench, May 26, 1941
div1.opener:
JRB
St. Augustine, Florida.
May 26, 1941.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Thanks for your
note of May 23 and the snap-
shots, which my man found
in my box at the postoffice
after mailing a parcel with
letter enclosed, addressed to
you.

I await with interest the
writeup you will send me
later on.

Congratulations on keeping
so busy; it's the only way to get
through this weird life happily.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, John R. Bullard. My best to all old friends.
